name: Naruto Shippūden: Gekitō Ninja Taisen! EX
summary: Naruto Shippūden: Gekitō Ninja Taisen! EX (NARUTO -ナルト- 疾風伝 激闘忍者大戦! EX, Naruto Shippūden: Great Ninja Battle EX) is the fifth instalment of the Japanese-exclusive Gekitō Ninja Taisen series. This game was also the first Gekitō Ninja Taisen game to be released for the Nintendo Wii as well as the first entry into the EX sub-series.

alternative_names.name: ナルト- 疾風伝 激闘忍者大戦! EX
Naruto Shippūden: Great Ninja Battle! EX
